column3: Concept ACK\n\nThis change matches the intention of the comment above the changed line.

I wonder at some point it wont make more sense to make this override Linux specific, "instead of all UNIXy systems-except-BSDs and MacOS".

Anyhow,
Code review ACK fdd71448e78f442ffd93a3a3398a5062eaba9f1b
This is a valid solution, just not nice to keep extending this list forever, there are so many BSDs.
> This is a valid solution, just not nice to keep extending this list forever, there are so many BSDs.\n\nGoing to merge this for now. Agree that we could rework how this is done in future.
